title: Science PBL Project Workshop for Creative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more science PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects applying creative design principles.
Learners can establish instructional designs that solve problems in elementary science education settings using convergent thinking.
Learners can produce educational material prototypes with over 80% completion through peer feedback and iterative improvements.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
